parameters.prompt: synthwave, melancholic, futuristic, introspective, electric piano, reverb, slow-groove
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Neon lights reflect in puddles on the street, echoes of a past I cant delete, footsteps fade but memories repeat, a silent film stuck on rewind [chorus] Im dancing with shadows on a lonely screen, pixelated love in a broken dream, every touch is just a hollow gleam, were ghosts in the machine [verse] Static hums where your voice used to be, rewinding tapes of what used to be we, the futures bright but its not for me, not since you left the scene [chorus] Im dancing with shadows on a lonely screen, pixelated love in a broken dream, every touch is just a hollow gleam, were ghosts in the machine [bridge] Maybe in another timeline, wed be more than just a flicker in the night, but here were just data in the light, lost in the glow [outro] Ill press delete but you wont disappear, just another ghost in the atmosphere, another ghost in the atmosphere
